_sText:
This is my entry for the secret society contest.


A splinter faction of the former soviet republic is preparing to take over the world's goverments. Their sleeper cells have infiltrated all of the major governments around the world and they have secret bases scattered across the globe. We have located one of these bases through sattelite imaging. You and your team are to deploy to the remote Altai mountain range in Kazachstan and disable their base.




It's a standard bomb/defuse map with buyzones and 2 bomb sites.

features include:

-custom models

-custom textures

-custom skybox

-radar

special thanks to will2k and captainZz for their help.

***edit:***
Thanks again to Will2k for providing some nice screenshots!
